Title: Hustlers
Writer: Lorene Scafaria, Jessica Pressler (inspired by the article published by New York Magazine entitled "The Hustlers at Scores" written by)
Actors: Constance Wu, Jennifer Lopez, Julia Stiles, Mette Towley
Plot: Inspired by the viral New York Magazine article, Hustlers follows a crew of savvy former strip club employees who band together to turn the tables on their Wall Street clients.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 24 wins & 76 nominations.
